title: Chapter 942 - Wind And Waves
body:
Chapter 942 - Wind And Waves

When Su Yi visited Peach Haven Mountain, the old rooster’s disciple, Ling Zhen, told him that after receiving a secret message, the old rooster left for the Sea of Bitterness in a hurry.

At the time, Su Yi wondered who’d sent the sealed letter. Just what had left the old rooster with no choice but to leave the mountain he’d watched over for years?

But now, Su Yi was vaguely starting to understand.

The letter was almost certainly connected to Pi Mo’s disciples!

Four of Pi Mo’s disciples have already left for the Burial Ground of the Dao. Don’t tell me that they’ve also learned that Old Ghost Coffin Bearer has long since ventured into those very ruins? Su Yi sank into thought.

The Night Watchman told him that, a long time ago, Old Ghost Coffin-Bearer left the Coffin of the Six Paths of Reincarnation in the Burial Ground of the Dao, and that the Coffin of the Six Paths of Reincarnation was originally the Disc of the Six Paths belonging to the Infernal Palace’s Bureaus of the Six Paths.

Furthermore, according to Su Yi’s deductions, the long-vanished Old Ghost Coffin-Bearer was most likely trapped somewhere in the Burial Ground of the Dao.

Only now did Su Yi learn that as new developments arose...
